 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּלָדָה‎</span>] **noun feminine** usually ==iron, steel== (origin dubious; ***steel*** in Arabic is <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> but Vulgar Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (in Lexicons); loan-word from Persian <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> according to [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>Ges. Abh. 75</sup>, compare [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xxx(1876), 769</sup>, but uncertain, compare [[BDB#Now|Now]] and references); — plural [absolute!] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּאֵשׁפְּֿלָדֹת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָרֶכֶב‎</span> [[Nah.2.4|Nah 2:4]] &lt; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּאֵשׁ פִּלְדֹת וגו‎</span> [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Now|Now]], ***like fire the steel*** (fittings) ***of the chariots***.
